title: "England’s NHS scales up AI tools to help cope with coronavirus backlog"
excerpt: "After more than a year of diverting huge resources to battling coronavirus, England’s NHS is rolling out new artificial intelligence tools as it contends with the enormous backlog of patients whose medical care has been sidelined by the crisis."
